P

A list of passwords, in the same order as associated persons in PersonDBStub.persons.

PersonDBStub - Class in persons
A stub for interface IPersonDB, which does provide RAM persistency but no long-term persistency.
PersonDBStub() - Constructor for class persons.PersonDBStub
Builds a new, empty list of persons.
persons - package persons
A package providing classes for manipulating persons.
persons - Variable in class persons.PersonDBStub
The list of persons itself (without passwords).
